title: Primary role selector in Champion select
body:
*I think that having the role picker in champion select is a essential add-on which will allow players to quickly look for and decide the champion they want to play as, instead of scrolling down throughout the page and furiously panicking to find a champion.

I've added a photo which I've edited in the role picker to what it might look like if it was implemented!
Share your thoughts below, because in my opinion, it would be a great addition and would really help me when looking for a different champion to play! :3*
